sections.heading: Overview
content: Lisa K. Mannix, MD, is a neurologist specializing in the treatment of headache. She is in clinical practice in Cincinnati, Ohio. For the past four years, she was on staff at the Headache Wellness Center in Greensboro, N.C. Mannix earned her medical degree at the University of Cincinnati College of Medicine. She completed her internship and neurology residency at The Cleveland Clinic Foundation, where she also served as chief resident and completed a Seymour Diamond Clinical fellowship in headache education. Mannix is board certified in psychiatry and neurology. Mannix is an active member of the American Academy of Neurology, the American Academy of Pain Medicine, the American Headache Society, and the National Headache Foundation, for which she serves on the board of directors. She also serves on the practice improvement subcommittee for the American Academy of Neurology.
